item.title: GPT-3 is The Thing
item.description: Summary The Thing is a lot like GPT-3 due to it being extremely capable, but limited to the queries you give it. It’s as powerful as your understanding on how to talk to it. The Thing is a black box computer in the nomes series by Terry Pratchett. I make reference to the first book in the series Truckers. This book is freely available on the Internet Archive. Truckers by Terry Pratchett https://archive.
